attributes.action: Give private health care workers the same respect & acknowledgment as NHS staff
attributes.additional_details: Why should NHS staff be prioritised over other works and take the recognition when there other people out there doing the same or more 24 hours a day 7 days a week all year round.
attributes.background: Give all health care workers the same recognition as what the NHS workers receive

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. Alternatively, you may wish to sign one of these petitions:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308035

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
